DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Eight Week Evaluation Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A question asking if a disease evaluation or assessment was done at the eight week visit._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Eight Week Evaluation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A question asking if a disease evaluation or assessment was done at the eight week visit.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Eight Week Evaluation
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:A natural number greater than 7 and less than 9 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of seven and one.:Any period of seven consecutive days.:Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
A natural number greater than 7 and less than 9 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of seven and one.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

A basic or essential attribute shared by all members of a class.
